title: doc/tour: tour explains slices before explaining arrays.
body:
by **danielwong@google.com**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Go to page 30: http://tour.golang.org/#30
2. Slices are explained.
3. Previous pages do not talk about arrays, yet it seems that the concept of slice
builds on that of array.

What is the expected output?

A prior explanation of arrays.

What do you see instead?

An explanation of slices with no explanation of arrays.

What is the difference between a slice and an array? How are they related?
